Environment

Notes

  • Each environment variable should occupy a single line and have the form varkey = varvalue.
  • Whitespace before and after the key and value shall be stripped away.
  • No variable expansion will occur on the values in this form.
  • The initial text is the current environment that pyzombie server is using.


Arguments

Notes

  • Arguments may be on a single line or multiple lines.
  • All whitespace will be colapsed into a single space.
